sentence.Network_en: Avout 7 million people, including current president Thabo Mbeki and former president Nelson Mandela, speak Xhosa.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约有700万人, 包括现任的总统塔博·姆贝基和前任总统纳尔逊·曼德拉都说科萨语.

sentence.Network_en: Zulu and Xhosa version will be available soon and other languages will follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 祖鲁和科萨翻译的《圣经》和其它语种的《圣经》将很快提供给手机用户.
